artist: Designer: Edward Chandler Moore; Maker: Louis Comfort Tiffany
creditline: Given in memory of Katharine Pillsbury McKee
description: Tiffany table spoon, from a set of flat silver, hammered sterling silver with gold, copper and bronze ornaments; blade cast by Joseph Rodgers and Sons, London; flora and fauna motif, each piece being individual and distinct
markings: owner\'s monogram overlaid on back: [EMM]; [M]; [Tiffany & Co.]
medium: Sterling silver with gold, copper, and bronze ornament
object_name: Table Spoon, from a flatware service
title: Table Spoon, from a flatware service
